website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use and affordable, but it may not be as reliable (in terms of accuracy) as others on our list.
pros: Portable size makes it easy to carry in your purse or pocket
cons: Not as accurate as some of its competitors, and the screen can be hard to read
Test strips are a bit pricey

customer_reviews.title: One Touch Ultra Meters, the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using One Touch products for a long time and I know how reliable their meters are so that when I needed to replace the one I have I purchased this One Touch Ultra2 and I'm very happy with it. It works great, now I am getting correct numbers again. I tried a couple of other brands but kept coming back to One Touch, I trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mara M

customer_reviews.title: Simplest and Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the oldest basic blood testing type kit and brand. I suggest this for all beginners or people looking for simpliest method to learn how to begin tracking blood sugars.
customer_reviews.author: Plundered treasure

customer_reviews.title: Accurate system- test strips are more expensive though
customer_reviews.text: Accurate blood testing system - however be aware the strips for this type of tester are super expensive. I bought it as a backup but also did not realize how expensive the test strips are. Other brands do have cheaper test strips. This model does appear to be very accurate and it comes in a nice pouch for carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Meter
customer_reviews.text: This meter is a bit old fashioned as it does not connect to a computer, but, that is exactly why I like it. Very simple to use, easy to read. I have used One Touch for years, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great meter...test strips are too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Meter works great but too pricey when you have to test more than three times a day. I test a minimal of five times and this is not the meter for someone who does...went with Prodigy Talking Meter and pocket meter and just as accurate and much cheaper. One touch should lower the price of the test strips one of the most expensive compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This meter is made of cheap plastic. It feels more like a child’s toy than a piece of medical equipment. It is not rechargeable like other meters and requires two button batteries and not standard AAA even. It did not come with any test strips or lancets. The lancet holder is an odd size which requires proprietary lancets. I will be going back to my Bayer meter.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: I use this to calibrate a continuous glucose monitor. ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to calibrate a continuous glucose monitor. I'm concerned that the readings from the One Touch Ultra2 aren't consistent. I have done quite a few test/retest checks using two readings from the same drop of blood. The difference is often 10-20%.
customer_reviews.author: E ALLEN KENDALL

customer_reviews.title: but they are now useless. I -did- find mention of this in the ...
customer_reviews.text: While the meter itself works well, and as expected, no where on the product page does it tell you it requires special lancets for the lancing device. I currently have about 200 lancets that I used with my old Onetouch Ultra2, but they are now useless. I -did- find mention of this in the questions, but nowhere on the product page or description does it mention requiring special lancets.
customer_reviews.author: WSB

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it a zero rating, I would!
customer_reviews.text: My experience with the Ultra2 meter I received was disappointing to say the least. It consistently registered 30 to 55 points higher than my Contour Next, which has always run read consistently with my labs. My readings can go pretty low at times so if it reads 90 on this Ultra2 I have to wonder...is it really 60 or even 40?! What if I take insulin without knowing it is that low? To me, this was scary. It's not eligible for return but in my opinion, the meter I received belongs in the trash bin and not returned to stock! I am out the cost of the meter kit, additional test strips & control. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE: After weeks of use it quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Would NEVER recommend these. After finding the correct strips of which are mostly getting discontinued at most Walmarts, this thing quit working for good. Yes I tried new batteries and didn't help the matter. Money and time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.A

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: It did take me a few weeks to totally get the hang of the kit. The lance holder was the most confusing, but once I figured out the correct dial setting it works fine. The display is large, which I like. The "auto on" when you insert a test strip is also handy. I'm down to less than a minute, start to finish, for testing. I take the meter to my doctor's appointments and let them track the readings. If you have to test your blood sugar regularly this meter would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Akers

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to get the right lancets!
customer_reviews.text: Threw this in my EMT go bag for my car. I've had to use it on patients a few times and I'm not disappointed. Make sure you get the right lancets, generic do not work. If you are using this like I do, get individual disposable ones so there isn't contamination between patients. The lancet pen isn't easy to fully decontaminate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The One Touch UltraSoft Lancets in "Frequently Bought Together" does not fit into this kit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the "One Touch Ultra 2 System Kit 1" saw that "Frequently Bought Together" offered the "One Touch UltraSoft Lancets" so I bought them. I forgot to double check. When I got the Lancets they didn't fit, and you can't return them. What a trap.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K Nomura

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I am not diabetic, but have started eating whole food/plant based and needed to test my blood for a glucose tolerance test. I use it now and then and it is good to know my numbers before and after eating.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: East to use
customer_reviews.text: My mom used to use the FreeStyle glucose reader but her insurance now covers the test strips for One Touch which is why I got her this. Her FreeStyle reader worked for years without a hitch so hopefully this One Touch does the same. So far so good. It’s easy to use and there are YouTube videos that walk you through the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O

customer_reviews.title: No test strips
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy test strips and control solution separately, no free samples to get you started..I would have bought a complete system if I had known
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lowery

customer_reviews.title: total disclosure about the product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how well or not the product worked because it did not include any test strips. it would be nice to know that before someone buys it. Should have been disclosed during the ordering process. This is the first time ever using such a product so I was not aware test strips were not included. Put it somewhere in the description when reviewing the product. I equate this to buying a handgun without a firing pin. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but not easy to understand.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great when all you need is a quick insight on your glucose levels. However, when you actually need to make records and gild readings as before meal or after meal, it lacks. It is not very intuitive or user friendly at first. After reading the instruction package twice I sort of got everything I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package was NOT left in a secure location
customer_reviews.text: Package was NOT left in a secure location ... it was sitting in the middle of my driveway
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: This monitor simple and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor but only three stars in the easy to see category. It has a backlight for when you are setting the monitor up. No backlight four readings.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Simon

customer_reviews.title: Reads same as my other meter, its great to have same reading on 2 meters
customer_reviews.text: This meter is just like the one i have had for several years and reads within 1 point of my regular meter. I bought this meter to leave at work and have been very happy with it and best price anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Hi bill

customer_reviews.title: Quick results
customer_reviews.text: The supplied device in this kit uses the One Touch Delica lancets.
customer_reviews.author: customer Good read, buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive strips
customer_reviews.text: The test strips for this are super expensive. And they give an error more often than not. I used at least 3 every time I test. $35 for 25 strips
customer_reviews.author: katie carter

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would update my older One Touch meter, but I'm not fond of this new one. It's smaller and almost impossible to read. Not the glucose number, mind you, but the set-up and whatever else is on that menu when you first turn it on. Also, I'm used to the meter giving me a short beep when my number comes and/or if there's an error. All told, I'm probably going to stick with my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Leonette

customer_reviews.title: The lancing device is a different model than shown but works with one touch delica lances.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use my FSA card to purchase.at half the cost of my pharmacy price.came with ten lances,case and upgraded lancing device.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Unit is easy to use; however, the lancet device is subpar and flimsy. I chucked it and use the old device I’ve had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Student77

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture showing the item comes with Delica, but it didn’t. So, I received the wrong product (maybe an order version) and I want to return it, but it stated the item not eligible to return! Even though it been less than a week when ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Hasanain

customer_reviews.title: nice but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get the hang of it. Used for testing Blood Sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Debora de Faria

customer_reviews.title: High quality and cost
customer_reviews.text: I love these they are easy to use and they don't hurt when I prick my finger These are the best by far
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn B.

customer_reviews.title: great little machine
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, and easy to read - but I don't know how accurate it is - no way to really check that
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3 teenage girls!

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I’m a type 1 diabetic and this glucometer Works very well and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: elio rojas

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money and blood
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with the one that my mom gave me always saying “Error 2 Meter or test strip problem. Try a new test strip”. Bought new strips and still the same error. Tried a new meter and also some of their Control Solution. Still the same error code. Yes, I am using the device correctly according to the instructions. I have only had one correct reading out of numerous attempts using both a droplet of blood or their solution. New meter, test strips, and control solution. Nothing has expired, but, nothing except problems with this brand. Will try to find a better brand that actually works without having to draw blood out of all of my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.text: I have been a diabetic for 30 years. I am technology challenged. I love the one touch ultra 2.
customer_reviews.author: gary colburn

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy to use as advertised,the directions were not kind of all over the place
customer_reviews.author: S. Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine that doesn’t require a lot of blood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought one in the past in a drug store, which included 10 test strips. This kit did not include them,. was there supposed to be some?
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Cristofaro

customer_reviews.title: Standard glucometer
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I thought it came with a few strips but I was wrong. Probably my fault. If you only need the basics this is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hawman

customer_reviews.title: Sugar back under control
customer_reviews.text: These are the most reliable meters on the market very accurate i needed a new on after 16 years Amazon had the best deal
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great that it stores multiple readings, wish it could have 2 people entered (like the scales) so you didn't get tests confused.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The box is damaged and look not like new item
customer_reviews.text: The meter is easy to use and read. The one touch ultra 2 kit was delivered on time. However, I give 3 stars because the box is damaged and not look like new item.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a vampire.
customer_reviews.text: This one takes a lot of blood. I have lost a bunch of test strips because it tells me I needed more blood. My other meter takes a speck of blood.
customer_reviews.author: Randal K Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great meter. Takes little blood. Does not come with any test srrips.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Of all the other meters I have this almost exact as my doctor
customer_reviews.author: Vincent berkes

customer_reviews.title: I really like the One Touch 2
customer_reviews.text: I really like the One Touch 2. Very easy to use and large screen to read the numbers. I also have a mini one touch and don't like it as much.
customer_reviews.author: rug

customer_reviews.title: necessary for diabetics...
customer_reviews.text: find this meter requires more blood than others but it works well
customer_reviews.author: RWVermont

customer_reviews.title: No test strips in box
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice product but there were no test strips in the box so I haven't been able to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Byers

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's a glucose monitor so it's hard to get excited in a review lol. It does what it is supposed to do w/no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: The accuracy of the machine
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s accurate coz I took one more time is different reading for three times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: item misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: the item was grossly misrepresented - the implication was that the device included test strips - there was no indication that the item was discontinued by manufacturer - shame on you for misleading the buyer
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: works well everyday, reliable!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one i have purchased in 10 yrs. good product
customer_reviews.author: danny saenz

customer_reviews.title: The most reliable one I’ve found so far
customer_reviews.text: The most reliable one I’ve found so far. Seems accurate. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pdxguy

customer_reviews.title: Meter is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate. I replaced my freestyle lite meter because it was too expensive to get test strips for at the pharmacy. Despite previous reviews I have found this meter to read within a few points of the freestyle lite meter.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Timing
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. Machine was great and even had extra pin needles for the pin included.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Inaccurate Meter
customer_reviews.text: The meter reading cannot be trusted! I cannot use this meter and want to return it. Doctor has also shown that readings are typically more than 20mg off the actual. This does not even meet the standard - and yes, I code with the package of strips. Additionaly, does not allow you to apply more blood - requires a lot for a reading or it fails the strip and you must use a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Embrace Nutrition

customer_reviews.title: Monitor Working Great!
customer_reviews.text: Although packaging was weak (it arrived in torn open package) the item itself was fine and has been working well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc E

customer_reviews.title: Glad youwere a source of this modestly priced alternative
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for monitoring my blood sugars closely. My insurance did not cover the costs of these monitors. Glad youwere a source of this modestly priced alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Knowledge is power...stay informed
customer_reviews.text: Appeared accurate. Reasonably priced. I would purchase again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: F is for Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived exactly on time. It's a glucometer so it's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but I need the strips to use it
customer_reviews.author: Gd from id

customer_reviews.title: and I love the lancet in
customer_reviews.text: Have purchase this before, and I love the lancet in particular
customer_reviews.author: Whatabeanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small meter that was bought as a replacement. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Jada Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved this device. Strips were a bit hard to find in stores but online a piece of cake. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Labrum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase, reliable product, and easy, intuitive use. The daily history provided is also very helpful. It requires a very small amount of blood. Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Infomapper

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t give complete information about this product
customer_reviews.text: I doesn’t mention tha in order to work it needs a liquid solution, that is a huge set back on this seller
customer_reviews.author: Veronica B. Sierra

customer_reviews.title: this is a pretty decent meter
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty decent meter. It was the one I got from my hospital visit and I had an accident and lost so I'm glad to find a good price for it
customer_reviews.author: ralonzo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed could not return
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize I could not return the item. I bought it for my mom and the insurance gave her a free tester so I wanted to return the item
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sirois

customer_reviews.title: The best glucose monitor on the market
customer_reviews.text: The best glucose monitor on the market. Recommend that you do not use the others. Excellent service; product was brand new and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Penny J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast and in good condition. Very good machine to check blood sugar and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar V

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I need 2 sugar monitoring systems. Bought one and this same one again. Reasonably priced, use little blood sample, work fast, and are much easier than anything else I have bought. I wish they had this when my Dad was alive.
customer_reviews.author: scampchipper

customer_reviews.title: Imcomplete item should at least come with a few test strips
customer_reviews.text: Can’t review yet didn’t know it didn’t come complete so I had to order test strips and now if will be a few more days until I can them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and gives readings similar to what I get at the doctor's office. Another brand I tried 2 units and was always 20-30 points high.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kimper

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised just like the previous one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for one that I lost on trip. It works as advertised just like the previous one. Since the most expensive part of this is the test strips I needed something that would you the test strips that I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old diabetes machine
customer_reviews.text: It’s doesn’t work... and it’s missing part of the kit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sorry
customer_reviews.text: came in but with no strips have to buy seperate should have had a few in package do not buy
customer_reviews.author: carlwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use, works great. Fast shipping.Very pleased. Only draw back is the cost of the strips.
customer_reviews.author: CharleK

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup. It comes with a very small case which fits perfectly in my handbags.
customer_reviews.author: ohms

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken upon receipt and was not able to be returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cutler

customer_reviews.title: One Touch Ultra 2
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was a little slow, but the product was perfect, so it was worth the wait. Thank you. What is this so many words required? Makes you not want to review a product.
customer_reviews.author: slgcme

customer_reviews.title: Weird thing
customer_reviews.text: The lancets were sewn into the case, I had to cut it to get them out and then repair with tape. Weird, but does not effect system.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kenkel

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with test strips
customer_reviews.text: I got this because a review stated it came with test strips. It did not.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great meter! Love it and can use generic strips with it reducing the cost!
customer_reviews.author: ReggiSaurusRex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitoring system.
customer_reviews.text: This glucose monitoring system is easy to use and the results are accurate (I have 2 of these) and occasionally compare the results. I would buy another one and will recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ell

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. The machine is very accurate. My insurance company changed to this monitor and I was skeptical at first. I looked to amazon because these can be very pricey. I got it for a great price and it even came with a lancet. would recommend this product to anyone looking for a quality monitor.
customer_reviews.author: monica smith

customer_reviews.title: Got it; it worked
customer_reviews.text: HAs been a positive online ordering experience. Met my expectations; arrived quickly; product worked as expected. It is as simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: Bill White

customer_reviews.title: Reliable - great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first glucometer but after seeing my mom struggle with many different ones over the years I was relieved to have absolutely no issues. I've had it for 3 months now and it works great every time. I use it with the Blue strips and delica lancet. Great system.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Varghese

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. The system included a monitor, a pen for drawing blood, and a sample of lancets and strips. When I checked with my local pharmacy the cost for a kit like this was over $100. I had received one prior to this, which was paid for by my insurance, and it was identical. I needed another one - for our second place - and was very pleased to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: when I first got this Glucose Monitoring it gave me ...
customer_reviews.text: when I first got this Glucose Monitoring it gave me a hard time, it did not work at first and I don't know why, Now it started working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best buy.
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for anyone with diabetes if you use One Touch Ultra test strips. It is my opinion that evryone should have a replacement meter on hand at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Cloverman6

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to randomly check my sugar level and use for first aid. Seems to work easy for never using a meter before.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I had an older version.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version. This one is much better
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Toural

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with lancet device.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as it says "system" and would expect that it comes with the lancet device. It did not. Paid a higher price expecting all the things necessary to replace my lost device and to continue testing. Double checked my original box as received from my doctor. It says @system" and came with a lancet device.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and seems very accurate. I like it better than any other meter I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vance

customer_reviews.title: One Touch 2 Ultra meter.
customer_reviews.text: I like the meter, it's use is eary to learn and it's speed of results is very quick.. The huge page of instructions is somewhat intimidating, however. The Delica lancet included is very cheaply made and looks ready to break (the button) after about 4 uses. At "free" it is a good addition, but it certainly would not be worth the $11.00 plus that it sells for. I am pleased with the meter and like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: peggy staton

customer_reviews.title: Unit did NOT come with a lancing device.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an identical 2009 unit that I had accidentally spilled liquids into. Unlike the previous kit, this particular kit just purchased did NOT include a lancing device. The box is labelled that it is sold separately. I don't know if this true of all current kits of this model, or just the type I had bought from this one vendor. It did come with the same kind of nice carrying case, and 10 test strips, as before.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blood Sugar Kit
customer_reviews.text: This unit was to replace my old one that lasted about 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Cbsraymond

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the blood glucose monitor. It came on the date expected which was wonderful!! I had never used one so I called the shipper and he was great. He directed me to who I should call. I will definitely deal with them again. I am so very satisfied :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kit is good but lancets do not puncture enough to get enough blood to cover strip
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got this product on time. It was new, but one thing was missing. I think the price was fair, so I don't complain. Thanks. Natasha
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Shemchuk

customer_reviews.title: Did not include lancet system
customer_reviews.text: Is not a complete product. You have to buy the lancet system separately. The ad is incomplete and does not provide full information.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I was forced to change the glucose system I was using because of insurance this meter uses so much more blood then the other and if you do not get a big enough drop of blood on the strip you have to use another strip WHAT A WASTE the other system I was using you just had to add more blood I am not happy with this system at all
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Maloney

product_meta.title: One Touch Ultra2 System Kit 1
product_meta.description: A fast, gentle and simple way to see the effect of food on your blood sugar results. The OneTouch Ultra2 is fast, with results in just 5 seconds. Plus, it uses the latest technology to provide you with the inside information you need to help you manage your diabetes better.
feature_bullets: See the impact of your food choices
See the effects of food and portion choices over time
